name: Set of 4 Multi Color Stripe Washcloths
description:
Bath time is a fun time- and now it's adorable too. This set of 4 washcloths is a great addition to your bath tradition.

Each washcloth is made with a super soft flannel top, serged together with a very absorbent terry cloth back. They each measure approx 7.5 " x 7.5"- perfect for your hands and your little ones hands as well.

name: Monster Crinkle Tag Toy
description:
The perfect toy to keep your little ones entertained! Just enough crinkle to make them happy, not enough to make you crazy.

Made with a soft flannel top, layers of crinkle in the middle, and finished with super soft minky on the bottom. Each toy is approx. 7"x 7" with 1&1/2" ribbon tags.

They are double stitched + top stitched so they are durable and sure to last!

name: Blue and Cream Houndstooth Bib
description:
This adorable bib is made to keep your baby comfortable, clean, and stylish!

Three snaps make it adjustable and able to grow with your child. Made with a super cute cotton front and an extra soft minky back, you'll never have to sacrifice style for comfort.

The main body of the bib measures approx 7 3/4" x 9" and is top stitched all the way around to make it extra durable.


*colors may be slightly different depending on monitor settings
*because each item is handmade- design placement may vary from bib shown

name: Hedgehog Diaper Cover
description:
Let’s face it. Diapers are ugly and most diaper covers are boring. But they don’t have to be. Baby doesn't need to be embarrassed to go without pants any longer! Not only are these diaper covers lined with PUL fabric to make them water resistant, they’re crazy cute on the outside. They’re not made with any fleece of flannel, which makes them super breathable while still providing lots of wetness protection (so you don’t have to change their clothes 12 times a day anymore). These covers are made with a little extra room and are best used with tri fold or flat diapers.

Each cover has 3 snaps so they’re adjustable and grow with them as they get bigger (and start walking, talking, and trying to use a spoon). Your baby isn't a baby anymore? These are a great potty training tool. Just snap them on over the underwear so you don’t have to follow the little one around with paper towels and carpet cleaner.

3 sizes of this cover are available 
Small- fits 8-20 lbs (approx.)
Medium- fits 18-28 lbs (approx.)
Large- fits 25-40 lbs (approx.)

Cleanup is a breeze. Not too big of a mess? Simply rinse and dry (hang dry or in the dryer). Bigger mess? Throw it in the washer with the cloth diapers and dry on the line or in the dryer. Just make sure that the snaps are snapped, please.

Please remember that each diaper cover is handmade by me which means that the cover may look slightly different than the cover shown (you’re not going to get a completely different cover, the design just may not be placed exactly like it is in the photo).

Also, monitors are different. Settings are different. The color you see may vary slightly from the actual color.
